## What's Changed
* Scale attribute, entity and relationship width to account for long names by @junron in https://github.com/octo-kumo/evil-er/pull/1
* Add keyboard shortcut for adding entities and stuff by @junron in https://github.com/octo-kumo/evil-er/pull/3
* Fix bug with weak entities and relationship by @junron in https://github.com/octo-kumo/evil-er/pull/2
* movable specialisation
* schema rendering options
  * line jumping, jump over other lines
  * prevent line overlap, will try to prevent arrows and lines from overlapping
* fixed some issues with dragging right after placement
* custom font
